song.title: Tons d'automne
song.info:
To thank everybody for a great year here's a new song we made a while ago.
We literally went around the world this year and are extremely grateful for all the listens, downloads and purchases you guys did.
Hopefully 2014 will rock as much or more!
We're working hard on a couple of projects which you'll hear more of in january. For now, have a cosy Christmas and a safe NYE!
xoxo [artist]1332[/artist] & [artist]3946[/artist]
-23 channels, 190kb extended module (xm).
